text: 2003 FIFA Confederations Cup was the 6th FIFA Confederations Cup tournament. It took place in France from 18 June to 29 June. The host, France won the tournament after defeating Cameroon. Turkey got third place. ==Results== ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 3 0 0 8 1 +7 9 3 2 0 1 4 2 +2 6 3 1 0 2 4 3 +1 3 3 0 0 3 1 11 −10 0 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 2 1 0 2 0 +2 7 3 1 1 1 4 4 0 4 3 1 1 1 3 3 0 4 3 0 1 2 1 3 −2 1 ===Knockout stage=== {{Round4-with third |26 June - Lyon||1||0 |26 June - Saint-Denis||3||2 |29 June - Saint-Denis||0| (asdet)|1 |28 June - Saint-Étienne||1||2 }} ==References== ==Other websites== *RSSSF Category:FIFA Confederations Cup tournaments Category:2003 in association football Category:2003 in Europe Category:2000s in France Category:Football in France
